abstract: “It’s just not right to just blanket ban a group of people,” said one college professor who has lived in the U.S. for about 20 years.
lead_paragraph: The Trump administration’s expansion of the nation’s contentious travel ban on Friday to include Nigeria, Africa’s most populous nation, and several other countries deeply rattled immigrants, leaving some Nigerians in New York worried that it would break family ties and have a negative effect on both countries.
